definitions.text: (usually preceded by `in') a detail or point
paying particular notice (as to children or helpless people)
examples: he spends without heed to the consequences

definitions.text: (usually plural) a polite expression of desire for someone's welfare

examples: he fixed his paternal gaze on me

definitions.text: the condition of being honored (esteemed or respected or well regarded)
examples: a man who has earned high regard

definitions.text: a feeling of friendship and esteem
examples: she mistook his manly regard for love

definitions.text: an attitude of admiration or esteem
examples: she lost all respect for him
She views this quite differently from me
I consider her to be shallow
I don't see the situation quite as negatively as you do
This new ruling affects your business
